hotels.title: Elegant French Riviera Glamour with Glittering Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: The glittering Mediterranean and star-studded coast of Nice are a stone's throw away when you stay at Hotel Indigo Cagnes-sur-Mer, an IHG Hotel, a modern escape conveniently located in a charming coastal town. When it's time to explore, lose yourself in the French Riviera, sunbathing on the pebbled beaches, admiring the famed art galleries and indulging in seaside fare. After a busy day, retreat to your elegant room or make use of the fitness centre and glittering outdoor pool.
